Contributors

These are our branches:

  • master (opens new window) is our stable branch, and you'll find it running on pressbooks.com (opens new window) (and reflected in our latest release (opens new window)).
  • dev (opens new window) is a general-purpose work-in-progress branch. It is merged with master when a new release is forthcoming.
  • hotfix (opens new window) is for emergency patches. It exists solely to avoid conflicts with dev.
  • Any other branches you find are for feature development prior to merging into dev. Use at your own risk.
  • Tags (opens new window) represent releases, but if you are downloading a release for installation, you should download the package (e.g. pressbooks-5.0.0.zip) from releases (opens new window) as opposed to the source code.
